text: Hope Elizabeth "Liza" Soberano (born January 4, 1998) is a Filipina-American actress and model. She started acting in a range of television series and movies, including Wansapanataym (2011), Kung Ako'y Iiwan Mo (2012), She's the One (2013), Must Be... Love(2013). She rose to fame after playing the main role in the romantic comedy television series Forevermore (2014â€“2015) with Enrique Gil. She has since paired with Gil in the movies Just The Way You Are (2015), Everyday I Love You (2015), My Ex and Whys (2017), Alone/Together (2019) and the television series Dolce Amore (2016), Bagani (2018) and Make It with You (2020). Soberano is a Roman Catholic. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1998 births Category:Actors from Manila Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Filipino Roman Catholics Category:Actors from Santa Clara County, California Category:Living people Category:People from Santa Clara, California
title: Liza Soberano
